name: Critter Drop
description:
Created at Cal Poly, San Luis Obispo over the course of 48 hours. Return critter-balls to their island in the sky. Try not to drop any into the void!

Game created by
Kyle Piddington - Programming and Level Design
Flor Espino - Programming and Level Design
Grayson Goodman - Music

Special thanks to Bryce for help on the concept!
